tasks.title: AIOS v2 System Validation & Production Deployment
tasks.description: Validate BlueLabel AIOS v2 system reliability, security, and production deployment readiness through comprehensive testing and deployment optimization

context.goal: Ensure AIOS v2 MVP is production-ready, secure, and reliable
context.builds_on: Existing test infrastructure, Docker configuration, security framework

deliverables: Test and optimize Docker deployment configuration
Implement system health monitoring and alerting
Create performance benchmarks and load testing
Test multi-user scenarios and concurrent processing
Implement automated backup and recovery procedures
tasks.signals_when_done: System passes all tests and runs reliably in production environment
tasks.process_reminder: ðŸ”” NEW PROCESS: Please read your outbox! When starting, update status to 'in_progress'. When finished, update status to 'ready_for_review' for ARCH review before final 'completed' status. See /docs/system/TASK_STATUS_UPDATE_PROCESS.md

history.summary: Successfully created all task completion scripts
history.completion_message: Successfully created all task completion scripts and tested them

Comprehensive integration test suite created with 93% coverage. All orchestration components tested including task distribution, status tracking, completion scripts, and metrics collection. Concurrent operations test revealed need for file locking which is documented.

Successfully implemented error recovery system with file locking, recovery manager, retry logic, checkpointing, rollback mechanisms, and comprehensive tests. All components operational with documentation.
